title: FS: T206 Hindu Bradley SGC Poor $330
author: mintacular

posts.post_title: FS: T206 Hindu Bradley SGC Poor $330
posts.post_content:
Looking to sell this card bottom card Bradley. $330 dlvd (firm). Bought it before I saw some more desirable Hindu's from the same seller (Mark). Decent back might trade for high grade '57 BB or work out a partial cash/trade. I'm also very flexible with trades so if you have any high grade 71s/75s or low grade 53 stars maybe we can work out some kind of deal although I would prefer to get some paypal cash. Thanks, Pat

[url][IMG]http://i434.photobucket.com/albums/qq66/nollpm/Poweflfrontbradley.jpg[/IMG][/url]

Back is one on right without paperloss:

[IMG]http://i434.photobucket.com/albums/qq66/nollpm/HinduBacksPowellBradley.jpg[/IMG]
still have this card by chance?
Nope, sold it on eBay, took one on the chin
